dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large-scale dataset used for visual recognition tasks, containing millions of labeled images across thousands of categories.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:description: COCO-Stuff is an extension of the COCO dataset that includes both thing and stuff classes in context, providing a rich set of annotations for semantic segmentation.
dcterms:title: COCO-Stuff

dcterms:description: ADE20K is a dataset for semantic segmentation and scene parsing, containing a diverse set of images with detailed annotations for various object categories.
dcterms:title: ADE20K
